title: 9 Editor-Approved Outfit Ideas for the Holidays
description: Is any gift greater than style inspiration? I think not.
excerpt: Is any gift greater than style inspiration? I think not.
text: Have you started planning your holiday outfits yet? If the answer is no, I won’t judge. I know your calendar is booked and busy; you’re knee-deep in gift shopping, and that Thanksgiving food coma probably hasn’t even worn off yet... That said, time is ticking, and I know you want to end the year on a high note with a fabulous and festive ensemble. Whether you’re attending a casual office soirée, a boozy white elephant party, dinner at grandma’s, or all of the above, these looks will work for any type of gathering. From statement coats to leather boots and chic winter accessories, these looks can’t lose. Ahead, find my style guide for this holiday season. A Blazer and Jeans Edward BerthelotIn my opinion, you can never go wrong with blue jeans and a white tee, which I’m kind of an expert in, by the way. Finish it off with a plaid blazer, and suddenly you’ve put a festive spin on this perennial look.Diotima Hodges Plaid Double Breasted Blazer Now 40% OffEB Denim High-Rise Straight JeansFlore Flore Jill Long Sleeve T-shirtEmi Jay Sweet Dreams Silk ScrunchieAlaïa Le Teckel Beautisoles Gal Patent Leather MulesStatement Fringe Edward BerthelotBusiness on the top, party on the bottom. Styling a staple jacket, like an oversized blazer, over a dramatic skirt is the perfect solution when you can’t quite decide whether to dress it up or down.Munthe Mineral Midi DressNow 45% OffHelsa Recycled Twill S Curve JacketIntimissimi Modal Cashmere Ultralight High-Neck TopFrye Kate Harness Boot Hereu Fleca BagNow 10% OffSt. Agni 90s Slim Oval Sunglasses The Column Skirt and a Sweater Edward BerthelotI love a roomy sweater just as much as the next girl, but sometimes too much room can swallow you whole. If you find yourself running into this issue, try cinching your knit with an elevated belt to your silhouette some shape. Paring things down with a neutral look like this one will still make the right statement. A fabulous coat and a leather boot are all you really need. html:
Have you started planning your holiday outfits yet? If the answer is no, I won’t judge. I know your calendar is booked and busy; you’re knee-deep in gift shopping, and that Thanksgiving food coma probably hasn’t even worn off yet... That said, time is ticking, and I know you want to end the year on a high note with a fabulous and festive ensemble.

Whether you’re attending a casual office soirée, a boozy white elephant party, dinner at grandma’s, or all of the above, these looks will work for any type of gathering. From statement coats to leather boots and chic winter accessories, these looks can’t lose. Ahead, find my style guide for this holiday season.

A Blazer and Jeans

In my opinion, you can never go wrong with blue jeans and a white tee, which I’m kind of an expert in, by the way. Finish it off with a plaid blazer, and suddenly you’ve put a festive spin on this perennial look.

Diotima Hodges Plaid Double Breasted Blazer

Now 40% Off

EB Denim High-Rise Straight Jeans

Flore Flore Jill Long Sleeve T-shirt

Emi Jay Sweet Dreams Silk Scrunchie

Alaïa Le Teckel

Beautisoles Gal Patent Leather Mules

Statement Fringe

Business on the top, party on the bottom. Styling a staple jacket, like an oversized blazer, over a dramatic skirt is the perfect solution when you can’t quite decide whether to dress it up or down.

Munthe Mineral Midi Dress

Now 45% Off

Helsa Recycled Twill S Curve Jacket

Intimissimi Modal Cashmere Ultralight High-Neck Top

Frye Kate Harness Boot

Hereu Fleca Bag

Now 10% Off

St. Agni 90s Slim Oval Sunglasses

The Column Skirt and a Sweater

I love a roomy sweater just as much as the next girl, but sometimes too much room can swallow you whole. If you find yourself running into this issue, try cinching your knit with an elevated belt to your silhouette some shape.

Sezane Maurice Jumper

NA-KD Folded Waist Knitted Maxi Skirt

Maje Slim Double Leather Belt

Hunting Season Top Handle Bag

Toteme The Wide Shaft Boots

Bangla Begum Spiral Jetty Necklace

Shearling Trim

You don’t have to slip into a dress or skirt to celebrate. Paring things down with a neutral look like this one will still make the right statement.

Acne Studios Brown Padded Jacket

Haikure Bethany Trousers

Tom Ford Cassius Sunglasses

Mason Margiela Tabi Boots

Now 24% Off

Almada Label Mica Crewneck Sweater

Now 7% Off

Loewe Paseo Leather Bag

A Silk Scarf and a Classic Coat

Sometimes, less is more, especially if you’re traveling for the holidays. A fabulous coat and a leather boot are all you really need.

Jenni Kayne Olivia Coat

Tony Bianco Knee High Boot

Vehla Dixie Sunglasses

Massimo Dutti Split Leather Half-Moon Bag

Eugenia Kim Gigi Multicolor Headscarf

Eterne Long Sleeve Turtleneck Maxi Dress

Shades of Grey

This one has been on my mood board for months. Between the grey and brown tones and the effortless layering, it’s just so good.

Marant Etoile Lexana Wool-Blend Coat

Now 40% Off

Luca Faloni Scarf

Now 10% Off

Levi’s Baggy Dad Jeans

Faithfull the Brand Bodil Top

Now 20% Off

Acne Studios Multipocket Vintage Shoulder Bag

Sam Edelman Kasey Ballet Flat

A Comfortable Catsuit

For our mommas-to-be (or anyone else who just wants to be cozy), you’d be surprised at how fashionable a stretchy onesie looks with a wool coat and Uggs.

Golden Life Divinity Jumpsuit

J.Crew Wrap Trench Coat

Ugg Classic Ultra Mini Platform

Flattered Amanda Bag

Strathberry Skye Pure Cashmere Socks

Shashi Carre Earring

Belted Waist

When I say that I’m dreaming of a white Christmas, just know that it has nothing to do with snow; it’s this sophisticated cream jacket that I’m thinking of.

Mango Double Breasted Virgin Wool Blend Coat

Leset Rio High-Waisted Straight Pants

Now 25% Off

LA Made Roosevelt Turtleneck Tee

Staud Wrap Belt

By Far Maxi Cush Bag

Paul Andrew Disc Zip Mules

Festive Shimmer

There’s no better time than the holiday season to indulge in a little shimmer. I would add a glittery eyelid and a metallic shoe to round this one out.

Free People James Sequin Tank

Frame High Rise Wide Leg Trouser

Now 35% Off

Reformation Matteo Trench

Black Suede Studio Brooks 95 Sandal

Grown Brilliance 1/2 ctw Emerald Lab Grown Diamond Solitaire Stud Earrings

Cult Gaia Caldera Clutch
